members.doc: An action that the provider requires, no regards to the flow and allow the provider to implement what ever follow it likes

members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: data
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. metadata to be used on passing information from the redirect url response back into the system

members.name: country
members.doc: country code (two characters, i.e. US, GB, BR, etc)

members.name: stateCode
members.doc: state code (ISO 3166-2 format, i.e. US-AL for US state Alabama)

members.name: taxType
members.doc: tax type, accepting values: REGULAR / EU_VAT/ JAPAN_JCT / AU_GST / US_TAX / SG_GST

members.doc: tax type, accepting values: REGULAR / EU_VAT/ JAPAN_JCT / AU_GST / US_TAX / SG_GST

docs.summary: Boleto response data

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: The expiration date of the ticket.

members.name: barcode
members.doc: Code to be included in the barcode of the ticket.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: URL of the full version of the ticket.

members.name: providerLogo
members.doc: URL of the logo of the company/bank that is creating the ticket.

docs.summary: payment order data for payment widget sdk
tax entity

members.name: percent
members.doc: tax percent, will save two numeric values after decimal point

members.name: isTaxExempt
members.doc: If taxId is valid and country can be exempted for tax => set to true

members.name: creditAmount
members.doc: credit amount from previous purchase, usually from upgrade

members.name: discountAmount
members.doc: discount from applied coupon that will be reduces

members.name: isOnline
members.doc: if payment will be made online, if yes user will redirect to pay else user will get information how to pay

members.name: isRealtime
members.doc: if payment will get status response immediately

members.name: appId
members.doc: the external app id to connect payments widget on rendering

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: the external appInstance id to connect payments widget on rendering

members.name: id
members.doc: billing unique id for payment method, can be several for each payment method

members.name: name
members.doc: APM name to show in order page

members.name: logoUrl
members.doc: URL of the logo of the apm.

members.name: paymentType
members.doc: payment configuration of the alternative payment method

members.name: minimalPaymentAmount
members.doc: price of minimum amount in APM to send validate payment transaction

members.name: paymentExpiryByDays
members.doc: to communicate to the user the expiry of the offline payment instructions

members.name: externalPaymentMethodUniqueId
members.doc: the external unique id of the payment method

members.name: externalAccount
members.doc: the external account to connect payments widget

members.name: alternativePaymentMethodType
members.doc: the identifier of the payment method

members.name: shouldVerify
members.doc: indicates if the payment method should be explicitly verified

docs.summary:
not yet used, to be discussed later. To note the problem in have amount as a DECIMAL_VALUE.
 google.protobuf.StringValue minimal_payment_amount = 1 [(wix.api.format) = DECIMAL_VALUE]; // The minimum amount that can be used for validation (or any other transactions)
bool is_realtime = 2; // if payment will get status response immediately

not yet used, to be discussed later.
google.protobuf.Int32Value payment_expiry_by_days = 4 [(wix.api.readOnly) = true]; // The expiry of the offline payment instructions

members.doc: Data defining the next required action for 3Ds flow

docs.summary:
Tax information that should be used for rendering UPM / EditInvoice / Checkout / etc.
 Calculation is based on invoices currency.

members.name: defaultTaxType
members.doc: The tax field that should be rendered on UPM / EditInvoice / Checkout / etc loading.

members.name: taxTypeCountries
members.doc: After loading, for every country the user choose, taxTypeConfiguration.defaultTaxType should be rendered, except when user choose one of the countries from this list, and for those, the taxType in list should be used.

docs.summary:
Billing preferences to set up the checkout such as:
- The user existing billing accounts (PaymentSource)
- Suggested billing country

members.name: savedPaymentSources
members.doc: list of existing user payment sources (Currently return only the default payment sources).

members.name: suggestedBillingCountry
members.doc: If service first purchase suggested billing country is based on Request Geo, otherwise is based on past purchase

members.name: supportedPaymentMethodTypes
members.doc:
The allowed payment methods the user will be allowed to use for this order,
given he is purchasing in a currency and from a country that supports that payment_method.

members.name: supportedPaymentMethodTypesV2
members.doc: The allowed payment methods the user will be allowed to use for this order, given he is purchasing in a currency and from a country that supports that payment method.

members.name: isVerified
members.doc: is verified //TODO should be deprecated in favor of should_verify

members.name: shouldVerify
members.doc: indicates if the payment source should be explicitly verified

members.name: isPaymentSourceOwner
members.doc: is the logged in account the payment

members.name: isLoggedInAccount
members.doc: is this contributor the logged in account

members.name: isTeamMember
members.doc: is the user a team member

members.name: identityContext
members.doc: Identity context containing isTeamMember for logged in account

members.name: invoiceId
members.doc: The Id of the Invoice that was paid

members.name: nextAction
members.doc: Data for next step of a payment flow.

members.name: invoiceId
members.doc: The Id of the Invoice to be paid

members.name: amounts
members.doc: Amounts making up the invoice to be paid

members.name: cycle
members.doc: Period of billing cycle in SBS

members.name: productTypeName
members.doc: Name of the product type for example Ascend, Plan, Domain etc. From PremiumAsset.CatalogProductData.ProductData

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN - unknown interval unit
  • DAY - day
  • WEEK - week
  • MONTH - month
  • YEAR - year

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ADYEN
  • WORLDPAY
  • PAYMENTS - Used for both ApmGatewayPlatform (Stripe India) and GatewayPlatform (StripeUS, BraintreeUS)

messages.name: _com_wixpress_billing_api_v1_ThreeDsChallengeDisplaySize_ThreeDsChallengeDisplaySizeEnum
messages.displayName: Three Ds Challenge Display Size Enum Object

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SMALL - 250 x 400
  • MEDIUM - 390 x 400
  • LARGE - 600 x 400

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • GET
  • POST

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DRAFT
  • PAID
  • VOID
  • REFUNDED
  • DECLINED
  • PAYMENT_IN_PROGRESS

type of recurring Possible values are:
  • None
  • AUTO
  • HYBRID

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • VISA
  • MASTERCARD
  • AMEX - American Express
  • DISCOVER
  • JCB
  • DINERS - Diners Club
  • CARTE_BLUE - Carte Bancaire
  • ELO
  • UNION_PAY - deprecated, please use UNIONPAY
  • UNIONPAY

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SEPA

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • BOLETO - Boleto Bancrio, simply referred to as Boleto (English: Ticket) is a cash-based payment method used in Brazil. A boleto can be paid at ATMs, branch facilities and internet banking of any Bank, Post Office, Lottery Agent and some supermarkets until its due date. After the due date it can only be paid at the issuer bank facilities.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • SOFORT - IDEAL = 2;

type of recurring Possible values are:
  • None
  • AUTO
  • HYBRID

type of payment method types Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PAYPAL
  • EXTERNAL_CREDIT_CARD
  • SOFORT
  • SEPA_OFFLINE

type of payment method types Possible values are:

  • SOFORT

TAX ID in the UI. should we display a field for tax id, and should it be required. Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • HIDE
  • OPTIONAL
  • MANDATORY

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ASSET_TYPE
  • PLAN - Plan is a package purchased by the user Plan enables or disables usage of plan capabiltieis for a specific site
  • DOMAIN - Domain can be a domain purchased through Wix or a domain purchased outside of Wix but configured to use Wix
  • MAILBOX - Mailbox purchased through Wix
  • APP - Wix or third party app
  • DIGITAL_GOOD - Stock image, logo or other on-time-payment premium asset
  • CATALOG_PRODUCT - Dynamic product, created using the product catalog
